member.name: T:LightBuzz.Axis
member.summary: Represents a Cartesian axis.

member.name: F:LightBuzz.Axis.X
member.summary: The X axis.

member.name: F:LightBuzz.Axis.Y
member.summary: The Y axis.

member.name: F:LightBuzz.Axis.Z
member.summary: The Z axis.

member.name: T:LightBuzz.Calculations
member.summary: Provides methods for doing common calculations between vectors.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Calculations.Distance(LightBuzz.Vector2D,LightBuzz.Vector2D)
member.summary: Calculates the distace between the specified vectors in the 2D space.
member.returns: The distance between the vectors in the measurement units used.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Calculations.Distance(LightBuzz.Vector2D,LightBuzz.Vector2D,LightBuzz.Axis)
member.summary: Calclulates the distance between the specified points in the specified axis.
member.param: The axis to measure the distance in.
member.returns: The distance between the vectors in the measurement units used.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Calculations.Distance(LightBuzz.Vector2D,LightBuzz.Vector2D,LightBuzz.Axis,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Calclulates the distance between the specified points in the specified axis.
member.param: The axis to measure the distance in.
True if you want positive or negative distance. False if you only want the absolute value.
member.returns: The distance between the vectors in the measurement units used.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Calculations.Distance(LightBuzz.Vector3D,LightBuzz.Vector3D)
member.summary: Calculates the distace between the specified vectors in the 3D space.
member.returns: The distance between the vectors in the measurement units used.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Calculations.Distance(LightBuzz.Vector3D,LightBuzz.Vector3D,LightBuzz.Axis)
member.summary: Calclulates the distance between the specified points in the specified axis.
member.param: The axis to measure the distance in.
member.returns: The distance between the vectors in the measurement units used.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Calculations.Distance(LightBuzz.Vector3D,LightBuzz.Vector3D,LightBuzz.Axis,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Calclulates the distance between the specified points in the specified axis.
member.param: The axis to measure the distance in.
True if you want positive or negative distance. False if you only want the absolute value.
member.returns: The distance between the vectors in the measurement units used.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Calculations.Angle(LightBuzz.Vector2D,LightBuzz.Vector2D,LightBuzz.Vector2D)
member.summary: Calculates the angle between the specified vectors in the 2D space.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Calculations.Angle(LightBuzz.Vector3D,LightBuzz.Vector3D,LightBuzz.Vector3D)
member.summary: Calculates the angle between the specified vectors in the 3D space.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Calculations.Angle(LightBuzz.Vector3D,LightBuzz.Vector3D,LightBuzz.Vector3D,LightBuzz.Axis)
member.summary: Calculates the angle between the specified vectors around the specified axis.
member.param: The axis around which the angle is calculated.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Calculations.Angle(LightBuzz.Vector3D,LightBuzz.Vector3D,LightBuzz.Vector3D,LightBuzz.Axis,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Calculates the angle between the specified vectors around the specified axis and determines whether the angle will be signed/unsigned and big/small.
member.param: The axis around which the angle is calculated.
True for positive and negative angles. False for positive angles only.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Calculations.Angle(LightBuzz.Vector3D,LightBuzz.Vector3D,LightBuzz.Vector3D,LightBuzz.Axis,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Calculates the angle between the specified vectors around the specified axis and determines whether the angle will be signed/unsigned and big/small.
member.param: The axis around which the angle is calculated.
True for positive and negative angles. False for positive angles only.
True to return an angle smaller than 180 degrees (convex). False otherwise.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Calculations.Rotation(LightBuzz.Vector3D,LightBuzz.Vector3D,LightBuzz.Axis)
member.summary: Calculates the tilt/rotation of the specified segment around the specified axis.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Calculations.Rotation(LightBuzz.Vector3D,LightBuzz.Vector3D,LightBuzz.Axis,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Calculates the tilt/rotation of the specified segment around the specified axis.
member.param: True for positive and negative angles. False for positive angles only.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Calculations.Rotation(LightBuzz.Vector3D,LightBuzz.Vector3D,LightBuzz.Axis,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Calculates the tilt/rotation of the specified segment around the specified axis.
member.param: True for positive and negative angles. False for positive angles only.
True to return an angle smaller than 180 degrees (convex). False otherwise.

member.name: T:LightBuzz.Quaternion
member.summary: Represents quaternions.

member.summary: X component of the vector.

member.summary: Y component of the vector.

member.summary: Z component of the vector.

member.name: F:LightBuzz.Quaternion.W
member.summary: W component of the vector.

member.name: F:LightBuzz.Quaternion.Identity
member.summary: The identity rotation.

member.name: P:LightBuzz.Quaternion.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Access the X, Y, Z, W components of the quaternion using [0], [1], [2], [3] respectively.
member.param: The index of the component to access.

member.name: P:LightBuzz.Quaternion.XYZ
member.summary: Returns the 3D vector (X, Y, and Z values) of the current quaternion.

member.name: P:LightBuzz.Quaternion.Magnitude
member.summary: Returns the length of the current vector.

member.name: P:LightBuzz.Quaternion.MagnitudeSquared
member.summary: Returns the squared length of the current vector.

member.name: P:LightBuzz.Quaternion.Length
member.summary: Returns the length of the current vector.

member.name: P:LightBuzz.Quaternion.LengthSquared
member.summary: Returns the squared length of the current vector.

member.name: P:LightBuzz.Quaternion.Normalized
member.summary: Scale the given quaternion to unit length

summary.param: Returns the euler angle representation of the rotation.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Quaternion.Set(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Sets the X, Y, Z, and W components of the current quaternion.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Quaternion.Normalize
member.summary: Makes the current vector have a magnitude of 1.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Quaternion.Rotate(LightBuzz.Vector3D)
member.summary: Rotates the current quaternion according to the specified 3D vector.
member.param: The vector around of which to roatate.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Quaternion.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string representation of the current object.
member.returns: A string representation of the current object.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Quaternion.GetHashCode
member.summary: Returns the hash code of the current object.
member.returns: The hash code of the current object.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Quaternion.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current object.
member.param: The object to compare with the current object.
member.returns: True if the specified object is equal to the current object. False otherwise.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Quaternion.#ctor(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Constructs a new quaternion with given X, Y, Z, and W components.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Quaternion.#ctor(LightBuzz.Vector3D,System.Single)
member.summary: Construct a new Quaternion from vector and w components

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Quaternion.Equals(LightBuzz.Quaternion,LightBuzz.Quaternion)
member.summary: Specifies whether two quaternions are approximately equal.
member.returns: True if the quaternions are equal.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Quaternion.Normalize(LightBuzz.Quaternion)
member.summary: Makes the specified quaternion have a magnitude of 1.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Quaternion.Negate(LightBuzz.Quaternion)
member.summary: Negates every component of the specified quaternion.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Quaternion.Multiply(LightBuzz.Quaternion,LightBuzz.Quaternion)
member.summary: Multiplies a vector with another vector.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Quaternion.Multiply(LightBuzz.Quaternion,LightBuzz.Vector2D)
member.summary: Multiplies the given rotation around the given point.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Quaternion.Multiply(LightBuzz.Quaternion,LightBuzz.Vector3D)
member.summary: Multiplies the given rotation around the given point.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Quaternion.Dot(LightBuzz.Quaternion,LightBuzz.Quaternion)
member.summary: Returns the dot product of two quaternions.
member.returns: The dot product of the quaternions.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Quaternion.Angle(LightBuzz.Quaternion,LightBuzz.Quaternion)
member.summary: Returns the angle (in degrees) between two quaternions.
member.returns: The angle between the quaternions (in degrees).

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Quaternion.Lerp(LightBuzz.Quaternion,LightBuzz.Quaternion,System.Single)
member.summary: Linearly interpolates between two quaternions by t.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Quaternion.Slerp(LightBuzz.Quaternion,LightBuzz.Quaternion,System.Single)
member.summary: Spherically interpolates between two quaternions by t.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Quaternion.SlerpUnclamped(LightBuzz.Quaternion,LightBuzz.Quaternion,System.Single)
member.summary: Spherically interpolates between two quaternions by t. The parameter t is not calmped.

summary.param: Returns a rotation that rotates Z degrees around the Z axis, X degrees around the X axis, and Y degrees around the Y axis (in that order).

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Quaternion.Euler(LightBuzz.Vector3D)
member.summary: Returns a rotation that rotates Z degrees around the Z axis, X degrees around the X axis, and Y degrees around the Y axis (in that order).
member.param: The vector with the X, Y, and Z degrees of rotation.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Quaternion.LookRotation(LightBuzz.Vector3D)
member.summary: Creates a rotation with the specified forward and upwards directions.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Quaternion.LookRotation(LightBuzz.Vector3D,LightBuzz.Vector3D)
member.summary: Creates a rotation with the specified forward and upwards directions.
member.param: The vector that defines in which direction up is.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Quaternion.FromToRotation(LightBuzz.Vector3D,LightBuzz.Vector3D)
member.summary: Creates a rotation which rotates from towards to.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Quaternion.RotateTowards(LightBuzz.Quaternion,LightBuzz.Quaternion,System.Single)
member.summary: Rotates a rotation which rotates from towards to.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Quaternion.Inverse(LightBuzz.Quaternion)
member.summary: Returns the inverse of rotation.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Quaternion.AngleAxis(System.Single,LightBuzz.Vector3D)
member.summary: Creates a rotation which rotates the specified angle degrees around the specified axis.
member.param: The axis around which to rotate.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Quaternion.op_Multiply(LightBuzz.Quaternion,LightBuzz.Quaternion)
member.summary: Multiplies a quaternion by another one.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Quaternion.op_Multiply(LightBuzz.Quaternion,LightBuzz.Vector2D)
member.summary: Multiplies a quaternion by a 2D point.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Quaternion.op_Multiply(LightBuzz.Quaternion,LightBuzz.Vector3D)
member.summary: Multiplies a quaternion by a 3D point.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Quaternion.op_Equality(LightBuzz.Quaternion,LightBuzz.Quaternion)
member.summary: Compares two quaternions for equality.
member.returns: True if the quaternions are approximately equal. False otherwise.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Quaternion.op_Inequality(LightBuzz.Quaternion,LightBuzz.Quaternion)
member.summary: Compares two quaternions for inequality.
member.returns: True if the quaternions are different. False otherwise.

member.summary: Converts the specified Quaternion into its equivalent Unity Quaternion.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Quaternion.op_Implicit(UnityEngine.Quaternion)~LightBuzz.Quaternion
member.summary: Converts the specified Unity Quaternion into its equivalent quaternion.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Quaternion.op_Multiply(LightBuzz.Quaternion,UnityEngine.Vector3)
member.summary: Multiplies the quaternion with a Unity 3D point.
